input.sentences: off in the distance were the ruins of the building .
as we got closer we could make out it 's structure a but better .
there was nothing but rubble left on this side .
the door frame was still intact . it was fun to explore inside .
output.sentences: The ruins covered a large part of the landscape.
The structure was imposing and made for a striking visual.
Some parts were much more damaged than others.
There were places which were almost overrun with rubble.
All in all, the ruins were a memorable site.
